Anwar Mohamed Boudjakdji (born September 1, 1976) is a retired Algerian football player who played as a midfielder.[http://www.dzfoot.com/joueur.php?joueur_id=275&saison_id=13 La Fiche de Anwar M'ed BOUDJAKDJI - Football algérien]

Honours
* Won the Algerian League once with JS Kabylie in 2006
* Won the Arab Champions League once with WA Tlemcen in 1998
* Won the Algerian Cup once with WA Tlemcen in 1998
* Has 12 caps for the Algerian National Team
